Gnome children are young gnomes found in the Tree Gnome Stronghold. Like adult gnomes, they can be killed or pickpocketed. All of them use melee unlike their adult counterparts.

Gnome children can be found throughout the Tree Gnome Stronghold, particularly in the Grand Tree.

Gnome children can be pickpocketed at level 75 Thieving; doing so yields 198.3 Thieving experience. It is recommended not to pickpocket them until the player has level 85 Thieving, because even with gloves of silence, the player will fail most of the time.

Contents

  • 1 Dialogue
  • 2 Locations
  • 3 Drops
    • 3.1 100%
  • 4 Pickpocketing
  • 5 Dialogue
  • 6 Gallery (historical)
  • 7 Trivia

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

Gnome children may warn the player of a new world coming from the underground. It is unknown if this is a possible reference to Arposandra and if so why children know anything about it.

A gnome child may also offer the player a king worm.

'''Gnome children''' are young [[gnome]]s found in the [[Tree Gnome Stronghold]]. Like adult gnomes, they can be killed or [[Thieving#Pickpocketing|pickpocketed]]. All of them use [[melee]] unlike their adult counterparts.

Gnome children can be found throughout the Tree Gnome Stronghold, particularly in the [[Grand Tree]].

Gnome children can be [[Thieving#Pickpocketing|pickpocketed]] at level 75 [[Thieving]]; doing so yields 198.3 [[Thieving]] [[experience]]. It is recommended not to pickpocket them until the player has level 85 Thieving, because even with [[gloves of silence]], the player will fail most of the time.

==Dialogue==
Gnome children may warn the player of a new world coming from the underground. It is unknown if this is a possible reference to [[Arposandra]] and if so why children know anything about it.

A gnome child may also offer the player a [[king worm]].
